mapper.select: select simulation_equipment_id, name, number, type, software_system, version_number, supplier, status, purpose, laboratory_id, thumbnail, create_time, update_time from simulation_equipment order by simulation_equipment_id desc ;

select simulation_equipment_id, name, number, type, software_system, version_number, supplier, status, purpose, laboratory_id, thumbnail, create_time, update_time from simulation_equipment where number like concat(#{number},'%') order by simulation_equipment_id desc;

select simulation_equipment_id, name, number, type, software_system, version_number, supplier, status, purpose, laboratory_id, thumbnail, create_time, update_time from simulation_equipment where name like concat('%', #{name},'%') order by simulation_equipment_id desc;
select count(simulation_equipment_id) from simulation_equipment where laboratory_id = #{laboratoryId}
